query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS automatic_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  scheduleEnabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  scheduleFrequency VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'weekly' NOT NULL,
  optimizeOnStartup INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  lowDiskSpaceEnabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  diskSpaceThreshold INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  autoBackup INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  optimizationProfile VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'balanced' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  scheduleEnabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  scheduleFrequency VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'weekly' NOT NULL,
  optimizeOnStartup INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  lowDiskSpaceEnabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  diskSpaceThreshold INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  autoBackup INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  optimizationProfile VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'balanced' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
